file_content.text: Look, I know you pretty well, so I'll make you a deal.
You're too smart not to have an angle. You tell me what you're really after, I'll tell you why I'm on Zakuul.
I lost five years, Kaliyo. I woke up and everything we built was gone.
I want my life back.
Before this happened... we were finally in control. We weren't anyone's pawns. I want that again.
Yeah. Me, too.
So the reason I'm here? Zakuul messed things up for me. I had a lot going on, you got killed, and life fell apart.
Not like I was gonna stick with the Empire, right? And we burned a lot of bridges, so...
How bad did it get?
I got by. I always get by--owned a club, did some Exchange work--but it wasn't the same.
Eventually I figured, "you hit me, I hit back." Came to Zakuul to wave the anarchist flag, like back when.
Are you here to avenge my death? Is that what this is about?
Did you do all this for me?
Don't be stupid. I lost a lot of stuff when Zakuul rampaged through the galaxy--not just you.
Let's make a trade.
I checked up on you after you blew up the factory. You used to be someone, before you disappeared.
Totally selfless, huh?
I have a very long list of enemies. Some of them stole my life. Others are in my way. Whatever else happens, I'm making sure they fall.
I want revenge on everyone.
Glad to hear something pretty come from those lips.
Want to know why I'm here?
Before Zakuul showed up, I had a freelance thing going. Had a partner, money, connections. We shot people. The war messed it up.
Who were you working for?
Gangs. Others. We're not talking about that. Anyway, I landed on my feet--did odd jobs, owned a club. The usual.
But I pay my debts. Long time ago, I had an anarchist cell on Brentaal. I came to Zakuul to start the work again.
The Zakuulans seem very dedicated to their emperors. You can't be finding much traction.
How's that going?
You seem like more of an angry thrill-seeker than a believer in the cause of anarchy.
You don't seem political.
I was never hardcore about it, but I'm getting intellectual in my old age.
It's not about anarchy for you. You want to hurt the people here for ruining your "good thing."
You just want to cause pain.
Little of both.
Problem is, these people? Nothing hurts them. Blow up a building, droids rebuild. Cut up a scumwad, droids heal him. They don't know consequences.
Even you killing their Emperor just made them sniffle.
They've barely got laws... but it's not anarchy if nothing matters. It's just a sugar rush.
Skytroopers nearby. I feel it.
You hear that?
Skytroopers.
Gotta move. We're rigged for the Overwatch, but we have to stop at my apartment first.
Might be more droids there. You seem up for the challenge.
I was gone for five years. I lost everything I had. I'm going to get it all back.
I want my life back.
There's no secret agenda. Zakuul is a threat to everything, and no one but me is in a position to stop it.
I told you: I'll stop Zakuul.
